mapper.select: select c.authorities from tb_user_role a join tb_role_autho b on a.role_id = b.role_id join tb_autho c on b.autho_id = c.autho_id where a.uid = #{uid}

select b.detail_id, a.phone AS username, a.`password`, b.enabled, b.accountNonExpired, b.credentialsNonExpired, b.accountNonLocked from tb_user a join tb_user_detail b on a.id = b.detail_id where a.phone = '18029624303'
select c.authorities from tb_role a join tb_role_autho b on a.role_id = b.role_id join tb_autho c on b.autho_id = c.autho_id where a.code = #{role}
